column2: Proud bastard! [From.GetSheHeCap] shows no respect for [From.GetHerHis] liege!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is such a humble vassal, giving me the honor of his kill from the hunt. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a benefit to my rule, and [From.GetHerHis] humility is an example to us all.

I have given the order for a Grand Hunt to be organized in the woods of [Root.Location.GetName]. Many locals will come and join us, lords and commoners alike, all eager to prove their worth and to refine their hunting skills.
I will find the Great Stag of Dyfed!
May God bless our hunting day.
We will hunt down the mightiest boar of Middangeard!
My spear will soon taste the strongest boar of the woods!
